name: Line Followers
tagline: Some codes for IR sensor array based Line Follower Robots.
body: Here are the codes for all the line follower robots made by me, alone and alongside team-mates. Hardware platforms used: AVR ATMega 16, Arduino UNO. I haven't included comments or notifications regarding connections on the hardware, you can shoot me an email at adityakamath@live.com to know more.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
